result.eng: I didn't have a chance to get an education.
result.ga: Ní raibh seans agam foghlaim a fháil
result.orig: Ní raibh seans agam foghlaim a fháil
result.html: Ní raibh seans agam foghlaim a fháilI didn't have a chance to get an education.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ seans agam foġlaim a ḟáilI didn't have a chance to get an education.

result.html: Tá mé ag foghlaim GaeilgeI am learning Irish.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé ag foġlaim GaeilgeI am learning Irish.

result.html: Tá mé ag foghlaim gramadaíI am learning grammar.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé ag foġlaim gramadaíI am learning grammar.

result.eng: I speak a little French and I am learning Spanish at present.
result.ga: Labhraím beagáinín Fraincise agus tá mé ag foghlaim Spáinnise faoi láthair
result.orig: Labhraím beagáinín Fraincise agus tá mé ag foghlaim Spáinnise faoi láthair
result.html: Labhraím beagáinín Fraincise agus tá mé ag foghlaim Spáinnise faoi láthairI speak a little French and I am learning Spanish at present.
result.ponchtml: Laḃraím beagáinín Fraincise agus tá mé ag foġlaim Spáinnise faoi láṫairI speak a little French and I am learning Spanish at present.

result.eng: I'm not too good. I am learning still.
result.ga: Níl mé rómhaith Tá mé ag foghlaim fós
result.orig: Níl mé rómhaith Tá mé ag foghlaim fós
result.html: Níl mé rómhaith Tá mé ag foghlaim fósI'm not too good. I am learning still.
result.ponchtml: Níl mé róṁaiṫ Tá mé ag foġlaim fósI'm not too good. I am learning still.

result.eng: In 2000, he started learning to fly in Florida along with Marbhan Al-Seithí and Siad Deara.
result.ga: I 2000 thosaigh sé ag foghlaim eitilte i bhFlorida in éindí le Marbhan Al-Seithí agus Siad Deara
result.orig: I 2000 thosaigh sé ag foghlaim eitilte i bhFlorida in éindí le Marbhan Al-Seithí agus Siad Deara
result.html: I 2000 thosaigh sé ag foghlaim eitilte i bhFlorida in éindí le Marbhan Al-Seithí agus Siad DearaIn 2000, he started learning to fly in Florida along with Marbhan Al-Seithí and Siad Deara.
result.ponchtml: I 2000 ṫosaiġ sé ag foġlaim eitilte i ḃFlorida in éindí le Marḃan Al-Seiṫí agus Siad DearaIn 2000, he started learning to fly in Florida along with Marbhan Al-Seithí and Siad Deara.

result.eng: The pupils were learning about the history of black people at school recently.
result.ga: Bhí na daltaí ag foghlaim faoi stair an chine ghoirm le déanaí ar scoil
result.orig: Bhí na daltaí ag foghlaim faoi stair an chine ghoirm le déanaí ar scoil
result.html: Bhí na daltaí ag foghlaim faoi stair an chine ghoirm le déanaí ar scoilThe pupils were learning about the history of black people at school recently.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí na daltaí ag foġlaim faoi stair an ċine ġoirm le déanaí ar scoilThe pupils were learning about the history of black people at school recently.

result.eng: It's a shame I didn't get an education when I was young.
result.ga: Ba mhór an truaighe nach bhfuair mé foghlaim i m'óige
result.orig: Ba mhór an truaighe nach bhfuair mé foghlaim i m'óige
result.html: Ba mhór an truaighe nach bhfuair mé foghlaim i m'óigeIt's a shame I didn't get an education when I was young.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁór an truaiġe naċ ḃfuair mé foġlaim i m'óigeIt's a shame I didn't get an education when I was young.

result.eng: The man got a college education.
result.html: Fuair an fear foghlaim coláisteThe man got a college education.
